  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205310</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Defining Girl Power: Finding Self in the Media Maelstrom</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Definieren Von von Mädchen-Energie: Finden 
von Selbst in den Media Maelstrom</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Définir La Puissance de Fille : Conclusion 
de l'Art de l'auto-portrait dans les medias Maelstrom</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Definindo A Potência Da Menina: Encontrando 
o self nos media Maelstrom</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Definizione Dell'Potenza Della Ragazza: 
Individuazione dell'auto nei media Maelstrom</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Καθορισμός της δύναμης κοριτσιών: Εύρεση μόνος 
στη δίνη MEDIA</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Definir Potencia De la Muchacha: Encontrar a 
uno mismo en los media Maelstrom</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This lesson will compare different ways women in the media (from models to athletes) present their image and offer girls the opportunity to define their own standards for confidence and beauty.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <coverage>
            <string language="en">North America</string>
          </coverage>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Lektion vergleicht unterschiedliche 
Methoden, die Frauen in den Media (von Modelle zu Athleten) ihr Bild 
darstellen und Mädchen die Gelegenheit anbieten, ihre eigenen 
Standards für Vertrauen und Schönheit zu definieren.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette leçon comparera différentes voies que les 
femmes dans les medias (des modèles aux athlètes) présentent leur 
image et donnent à des filles l'occasion de définir leurs propres 
normes pour la confiance et la beauté.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta lição comparará maneiras que diferentes as
mulheres nos media (dos modelos aos atletas) apresentam sua imagem e 
oferecem a meninas a oportunidade de definir seus próprios padrões 
para a confiança e a beleza.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa lezione confronterà i modi che differenti 
le donne nei media (dai modelli agli atleti) presentano la loro 
immagine e che offrono a ragazze l'opportunità di definire i loro 
propri standard per riservatezza e la bellezza.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το μάθημα θα συγκρίνει τις διαφορετικές γυναίκες
τρόπων στα μέσα (από τα μοντέλα στους αθλητές) παρουσιάζει την 
εικόνα τους και θα προσφέρει στα κορίτσια την ευκαιρία να 
καθορίσει τα πρότυπά τους για την εμπιστοσύνη και την ομορφιά.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta lección comparará diversas maneras que las 
mujeres en los media (de modelos a los atletas) presentan su imagen y 
que ofrecen a muchachas la oportunidad de definir sus propios 
estándares para la confianza y la belleza.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Künste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τέχνες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

            <value>yes</value>

      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
